entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog at times early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
